package day1;

import org.openqa.selenium.By;
import org.openqa.selenium.chrome.ChromeDriver;

public class AmazonSignoff {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		System.setProperty("webdriver.chrome.driver","./drivers/chromedriver.exe");
		ChromeDriver driver = new ChromeDriver();
		driver.manage().window().maximize();
		
		driver.get("https://www.amazon.in");
		String title = driver.getTitle();
		System.out.println(title);
		driver.findElement(By.linkText("Start here.")).click();
		
		String title1 = driver.getTitle();
		System.out.println(title1);
		
		driver.findElement(By.xpath("//input[@id='ap_customer_name']")).sendKeys("Srinivas D");
		driver.findElement(By.id("ap_phone_number")).sendKeys("9553099688");
		driver.findElement(By.name("secondaryLoginClaim")).sendKeys("srinugupta2020@gmail.com");
		driver.findElement(By.id("ap_password")).sendKeys("Srinivas@7723");
		driver.findElement(By.id("continue")).click();
		

	}

}
